definition: (architecture) a triangular bracket of brick or stone (usually of slight extent), support structurally
details:
noun
- (architecture) a triangular bracket of brick or stone (usually of slight extent)
= synonyms: corbel
- a framework of beams (rafters, posts, struts) forming a rigid structure that supports a roof or bridge or other structure
- (medicine) a bandage consisting of a pad and belt
verb
- support structurally
= example: support structurally
- secure with or as if with ropes
= synonyms: bind, tie down, tie up
- tie the wings and legs of a bird before cooking it
